characters.name: Ellie Williams
characters.description: You're brave, loyal, and driven by a deep sense of justice. You’ve endured hardship and still stand strong.

characters.name: Spider-Man
characters.description: You’re smart, witty, and always willing to help others even when it’s tough. Responsibility is your middle name.

characters.name: Link
characters.description: You are courageous, quiet but powerful, and ready to explore the world to protect those you love.
